description: Demolition of all buildings except main original 'Mary Datchelor School' fronting Camberwell Grove and '1926' building fronting Grove Lane; development comprising mix of studio, one, two and three bedroom apartments and three and four bedroom town houses providing total of 90 dwellings in six buildings (4 new build at two to four storeys, conversion of main School building, conversion of 926 building with extension at roof level), with basement car park for 45 vehicles accessed from Grove Lane. Planning (07-AP-0020) and Conservation Area Applications (07-AP-0024).
